text: the way it came about was uh former
president katami who's a relative of
mine um after he uh left office in 2006
he came to the United States at the
invitation of a bunch of American groups
uh was given a Visa and um went
Washington Cathedral Harvard University
University of Virginia he asked me to
accompany him on his trip um in America
as sort of an adviser and help him with
some of the issues and some of the
translations of some of his speeches
which I did and um at one point in
Chicago before he gave his first speech
uh he said well why don't you just do
the interpreting of the speech and I
said well I'm not an interpreter that's
not what I do and I said oh come on your
English is really good you sound like an
American just do it it's not going to be
a big deal and I said okay so I did it
and it was I guess successful people
kind of like the way it was done um now
that said I did have the speech in front
of me translated into English which I'd
helped with in the translation and then
I just went on to do it at the
Washington Cathedral and then University
of Virginia so the Amad people found out
about obviously found out about um my
interpretation of uh ki's speeches and
they asked me if I would uh specifically
the ambassador to the UN asked me if I
would do the interpreting at the UN for
Ahmed who was arriving like literally a
few few days after katami left and I
said well under the same conditions that
I I agreed to do it with katami even
though I have a friendship and a
closeness to katami um and he was no
longer president of Iran uh I said the
condition would be that I'm able to
write about it nothing's on the
nothing's off the Record and to my
surprise they agreed and said fine do
whatever you want um and so I thought it
would be a great opportunity and it
would be an interesting opportunity and
I'd get to get to know even though I'd
met Ahmed Yad before I would get a
closer relationship with him and
understand him better and his AIDS and
the people he travels with so that's
really why I did it and um subsequently
every year even though I've written
about my experiences um doesn't seem to
bother them and uh every year they've
asked me again and I've said sure I'm
you know I'm happy to do it and uh so
that's how that came about it's not it's
not my profession but uh I don't mind
doing
it
